name: FreeOffroad-Desert
description:
A beautiful and exciting game with a sense of being!
In this game, you can explore the great places and earn money, and release better and faster OffRoad cars!
The game is beautiful and the wilderness is a natural game and you can enjoy the days of the game.
The wilderness is full of detail and you have to discover all the game locations with the OffRoad Cars and enjoy the long adventure you have.

Game features:

- 3D game graphics
- Realistic graphics game
- Beautiful design of cars
- OffRoad Cars and sports cars
- Has the number of steps above
- Varied environments
- An interesting handling system for cars
- Details in a good environment
- And ...
